item.title: Bobby McFerrin - Don't Worry Be Happy
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Don’t Worry Be Happy on the ukulele by Bobby McFerrin. The chords used are C F Dm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Bobby McFerrin - Don't Worry Be Happy
item.description:
Only C, Dm, F Strum pattern? Try the two reggae strum patterns notated and demonstrated at this website... http://ukulelehunt.com/2011/06/29/ukulele-strumming-patterns/
Check out the website for the ukulele jam sessions I run via Fredonia Ukulele: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.edu/fredonia-ukulele/
Check out my website for music teachers: https://sites.google.com/a/fredonia.edu/reese-ukulele/
